oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Aerial of Nashville downtown parking, circa 1970s
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A 1970s aerial view of downtown Nashville, Tennessee showing parking lots within the central business district, around Fifth Avenue to Seventh Avenue near Church Street and Commerce. Includes an aerial view of several businesses, such as Cain-Sloan and the Sam Davis Hotel (at 132 7th Avenue N and the corner of Commerce). Forms part of Record Group 3. The original is a 35 mm color transparency (2 x 2 in. slide mount).
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Cain-Sloan Department Store (Nashville, Tenn.); Sam Davis Hotel (Nashville, Tenn.)
